title: How to Draw a Snake: An Easy Tutorial

steps.title: Draw a medium-size oval shape for the snake's head.
steps.content: Draw a medium-size oval shape for the snake's head. Draw two small circles above that oval for a framework for the snake's head.

steps.title: Draw a curve connecting the circles and the oval to taper the snake's body.
steps.content: Draw a curve connecting the circles and the oval to taper the snake's body.

steps.title: Draw the curves extending from the small circle at the left end to complete the snake's body.
steps.content: Draw the curves extending from the small circle at the left end to complete the snake's body. The tail becomes more slender near the tail.

steps.title: Draw the sketch for the eyes and tongue for the snake's head.
steps.content: Draw the sketch for the eyes and tongue for the snake's head.

steps.title: Refine the sketch of the head to make distinct the snake's nose and mouth.
steps.content: Refine the sketch of the head to make distinct the snake's nose and mouth. Make it look like a cartoon and add details for the snake's body

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the snake's head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the snake's head.

steps.title: Draw the curved shape that overlaps the circle a little at the right.
steps.content: Draw the curved shape that overlaps the circle a little at the right. This serves as a framework for the snake's body.

steps.title: Draw the curves which connects and complements the first half of the snake's body.
steps.content: Draw the curves which connects and complements the first half of the snake's body.

steps.title: Draw the curves which completes the other half of the snake's body.
steps.content: Draw the curves which completes the other half of the snake's body. The curves become more slender near the tail.

steps.title: Add the details to the head for the snake's eyes, tongue, mouth, and nose.
steps.content: Add the details to the head for the snake's eyes, tongue, mouth, and nose.

steps.title: Add the details for the snake's body.
steps.content: Add the details for the snake's body.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
